meta.description: Context Sensitive Help (CSH) for table tx_sbportfolio2_domain_model_item

languageKey.label: What type of item is this? A normal item, a shortcut to a page or a link to a remote URL.
The item's title. Used in the FE and in table listings in the BE.
An alternative title for use in the FE.
An alternative title for use in the FE when space is restricted.
A short summary of the item.
The item's main link. This could be a file for print material, or a url if the item was a website and so on.
The item's full description, this can include links and images.
The date this item was "published" / "went live" or was completed.
Is this item a featured item?
Is this item "in progress", and not yet published/live - useful for displaying current projects.
The item's testimonial.
The item's tags.
The item's image folders (folders in fileadmin that contain images that are to be displayed with this item).
The item's links.
The item's files.
Portfolio items related to this item.
The item's films.
A flickr Photo Set ID to be associated with this item.
The item's categories.
The item's client - the individual or company this item was made for.
The item's images.
The URL that this item should link to instead of showing the Single display.
The page that this item should link to instead of showing the Single display.
The date that this item should start showing up in the FE.
The date that this item should stop showing up in the FE.
A preview image, that could be used in lists.
The item's content slider title.
The item's content slider image.
The item's content slider description.
The item's title for SEO metatags.
The item's type for SEO metatags.
The item's image for SEO metatags.
Facebook uses a square image at least 50x50 pixels, the image cannot exceed 130x110 pixels.
The item's description for SEO metatags.
The item's Facebook Application ID.
The item's Facebook Admin IDs.
